mapper.select: SELECT sp.seatPriceId, bs.ticketId, u.userName, bs.ticketName, bs.ticketType, sp.status, sp.usedDt, bs.placeName, CONCAT(sp.seatZone, '존 ', sp.seatRow, '-', sp.seatCol) as seatFull FROM seatprice sp JOIN Users u ON sp.userId = u.userId JOIN book_show bs ON sp.ticketId = bs.ticketId WHERE 1=1 AND u.userId = #{userId} AND sp.ticketId = #{ticketId} AND sp.placeId = #{placeId}
SELECT ticketId , placeId , placeName , ticketName , description , ticketType , homeTeam , homeTeamLogo , awayTeam , awayTeamLogo , startDate , openDate FROM book_show WHERE 1=1

SELECT bs.ticketId, bs.ticketName, bs.startDate, bs.homeTeamLogo , p.placeId, p.placeName, p.address, p.seatZone, p.seatRow, p.seatCol FROM book_show bs LEFT JOIN place p on bs.placeId = p.placeId WHERE p.placeId = #{placeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seatprice(ticketId, userId, placeId, price, seatZone, seatRow, seatCol, usedDt) VALUES(#{ticketId}, #{userId}, #{placeId}, #{price}, #{seatZone}, #{seatRow}, #{seatCol}, #{usedDt});
